body.name: Air Fryer Oven, CKOZESE 22QT Toaster Oven Air Fryer, 5-In-1 Toaster Air Fryer Combo With Warm, Broil, Toast, Bake, Air Fry, Toaster Convection Oven Oil-Free, Stainless Steel Countertop Toaster Oven
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 23 mins
features: 22QT Family-Sized Air Fryer Oven: Tailored for larger families, the CKOZESE Air Fryer Toaster Oven features an impressive 20L/22QT capacity. It can easily handle a 10-12 inch pizza, up to 22 chicken wings, a 5-pound roasted whole chicken, 3 pounds of crispy fries, and more

Versatile Toaster Oven Air Fryer: This air fryer with 1700W power, offers precise knob control, built-in cooking light, and large double-wall insulated windows. It's designed as the perfect kitchen assistant, replacing appliances like a toaster, rotisserie, fruit dryer, oven, etc. Ideal for families prioritizing a healthy diet

Innovative Air Fry Tech with 360° Rapid Heat Circulation: In contrast to conventional ovens, our air fryer toaster oven employs advanced 360° rapid heat circulation Air Fry Tech, reducing the need for up to 85% less oil than traditional deep frying. This innovative approach maintains the crispiness of your favorite foods, such as chicken, French fries, steak, fish, and more, making it an ideal choice for healthier cooking

Easy-to-Use Knob Controls: Navigate the culinary realm effortlessly with the CKOZESE Toaster Air Fryer Combo's intuitive 4-knob control system. Adjust the timer, temperature, function, and fan speed with ease, unlocking a world of cooking possibilities

Premium Food-Grade Stainless Steel: Engineered with top-tier food-grade stainless steel, our air fryer toaster oven combo prioritizes safety, durability, and effortless maintenance. Adding to the convenience, it comes with 4 dishwasher-safe accessories: a baking pan, grill rack, frying basket, and crumb tray
Simple Maintenance: All detachable accessories are dishwasher-safe, and the air fryer oven's surface and interior can be easily wiped clean with a damp cloth once it has cooled down

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Need to preface this by saying that this toaster oven was much much larger than I had anticipated. If you have a small kitchen with limited counter space, do keep that in mind. Luckily, this takes up the function of 3 tools (air fryer +toaster + oven.) So proceed with caution but do keep that in mind prior to purchasing. Shipping took a while for the item to get to my home-it kept getting rescheduled by Amazon so I was close to cancelling the orderAs an actual appliance, I've only tried the toasting and the oven function-I haven't personally tried the air fryer function yet. It does a good job as both a toaster and as an oven though, especially if you just want to broil something really quickly. It gets really hot on the top, so do not keep anything on top of the toaster oven. Interestingly enough, the item includes instructions which were and some recipes to try. Overall, it isn't a bad item, though I feel that there are other multitasker appliances that take up less real estate on the counter out there. I appreciate that it can at least fulfill the role of 2 appliances fairly well (have yet to try the air fryer function) but it is so large and bulky and I have a tiny, tiny kitchen. Not the item's fault, so no stars deducted on that basis. Appearance wise, it looks simple and sleek and is easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Air Fryer didn’t get the food crispy, only burned.
reviews.reviewText: We love using an air fryer for cooking and reheating food so we were eager to try out this multi-function oven.Our first meal in this oven was a bunch of chicken tenders in the air fryer. It was easy to set the temperature and the air fryer rack was roomy enough to fit all of our tenders in a single layer.PROS:(1) The oven was relatively quiet, even on the High fan speed.(2) The outside of the oven stayed cool so I didn’t worry about burning myself on the metal outside.(3) The chicken was well-cooked inside, but (see my CON below) it didn’t get that crispy.CONS:(1) the timer was a dial style that didn’t have clear distinction of the minutes so it was sort of a guess as to exactly how much time you were setting the oven for. It could have been 11 mins or 14 mins, for example, you couldn’t tell the difference with the dial countdown timer.(2) The food didn’t get crispy like I was expecting. I don’t know if that was the air fryer functioning not being great, or maybe the amount of time. It’s hard to know without doing more tests with the oven and different foods.(3) The temperature dial was similar to the timer, you could not dial in an exact temperature, it was only an approximate temp because of the demarcations for different temps were too far apart.(4) There is no “off” button. When I tried to turn the timer to Zero it was extremely difficult to do. I ended up just unplugging the appliance instead.On our second meal with the air fryer we tried some buffalo chicken bites from Costco. I set the timer for a longer period so that they would be crispier than my first try with the tenders. I also used the “high” setting on the fan this time.The results were not very good. Parts of the chicken bites were burned, yet the overall coating was not crunchy, instead it was sort of a soft mess. The chicken inside was cooked, but the exterior wasn’t appetizing at all. (I finally put the soft chicken bites into our Ninja air fryer to get them crispy.)OVERALL: As an air fryer, I’m not impressed with this appliance. The dials aren’t exact enough for temp or time, and the food doesn’t come out crispy like our other air fryer. We don’t use a toaster or broiler much so I didn’t get to try those functions in this machine. Maybe those functions work better than the air fryer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars bakes, broils, roasts and cooks really well -- toasting bread/bagels takes a bit longer
reviews.reviewText: I think this oven is great. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that for toasting things like bread, bagels, muffins, and other things that a small "toaster oven" works really well for, it takes a bit longer to heat up to get that done, due to the larger interior space. I have cooked a chicken in here and made chicken wings and french fries, and this oven does a great job "air frying" all of those things. I find this much more convenient to use than my full-size oven, as it heats faster and is easier to clean as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough about this oven. I have used it just like my in wall oven and everything bakes in half the time. The air fryer basket does chicken wings perfect. It is very easy to use. The settings are all designed for what you are using it for making it fool proof. Easy to clean. The trays slide in with ease. Sits perfect on countertop, not taking up too much room. We got rid of our toaster since this oven does that as well. So far I have not found any negatives to this oven. HIGHLY recommend!
